snippet: Dwight Howard will face criticism if he leaves the Magic, though he has helped maximize the franchise’s revenues over the last seven years.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Basketball column highlights Orlando Magic center Dwight Howard and the free agency decision he faces; asserts that free agency is a players' contractual right, not an indulgence, and Howard should not be castigated as having tuned his back on the franchise if he leaves.
lead_paragraph: Dwight Howard will face criticism if he leaves the Magic, though he has helped maximize the franchise’s revenues over the last seven years.
